   19: %%
   20: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   21: %% Purpose: Verify the application specifics of the Megaco application
   22: %%----------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: 
   24: -module(megaco_app_SUITE).
   25: 
   26: -export([
   27:          suite/0, all/0,
   28:          init_per_suite/1,    end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_group/2,    end_per_group/2,
   30:          init_per_testcase/2, end_per_testcase/2,
   31: 
   32:          app/0,   app/1,
   33:          appup/0, appup/1
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   37: -include("megaco_test_lib.hrl").
   38: 
   39: 
   40: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   41: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   42: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   43: 
   44: suite() -> 
   45:     [{ct_hooks, [ts_install_cth]}].
   46: 
   47: all() -> 
   48:     [
   49:      app, 
   50:      appup
   51:     ].
   52: 
   53: 
   54: %%
   55: %% -----
   56: %%
   57: 
   58: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   59:     ?ANNOUNCE_SUITE_INIT(),
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: end_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   63:     Config.
   64: 
   65: 
   66: 
   67: %%
   68: %% -----
   69: %%
   70: 
   71: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   72:     Config.
   73: 
   74: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   75:     Config.
   76: 
   77: 
   78: %%
   79: %% -----
   80: %%
   81: 
   82: init_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   83:     Config.
   84: 
   85: end_per_testcase(_Case, Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   86:     Config.
   87: 
   88: 
   89: 
   90: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   91: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   92: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   93: 
   94: app() ->
   95:     [{doc, "Test that the megaco app file is ok"}].
   96: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   97:     ok = test_server:app_test(megaco).
   98: 
   99: 
  100: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  101: 
  102: appup() ->
  103:     [{doc, "Test that the megaco appup file is ok"}].
  104: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  105:     ok = test_server:appup_test(megaco).
